query: what is your name in arabic

results.title: How to say "What is your name?" in Arabic
results.content: For example, you could say "اسمي (yourname)، ما هو اسمك؟" (ismii (yourname), maa huwa ismuk?) which means "Mynameis(yourname),whatisyourname?" LearningArabiccan be challenging, but starting with simple phrases like "Whatisyourname?" can make it more manageable.

results.title: How to Say "What is Your Name?" in Arabic Language
results.content: Iza btaḥib tiqūli?) Translation: What is yourname, if you don't mind me asking? Tips for Learners: Here are a few tips to keep in mind when practicing these phrases: Pay attention to pronunciation:Arabicsounds can be challenging for non-native speakers, so focus on pronouncing each word correctly.
